get.description: Get 2FA information for the current user

delete.description: Delete a specific 2FA method for the current user (requires verification code)

post.description: Remove 2FA using recovery code. Use this when you've lost access to your authenticator app.

get.description: Generate TOTP secret and QR code for 2FA setup

post.description: Verify TOTP code and enable 2FA for the user. Returns a recovery code that can be used to disable 2FA.
issue new access token by refresh token
login and get refresh token, access token
invalidate tokens associated with the current access token
Generate challenge for passkey login. Returns WebAuthn CredentialRequestOptions for navigator.credentials.get()
Verify the passkey credential from navigator.credentials.get() and return tokens
Generate challenge for passkey registration. Returns WebAuthn CredentialCreationOptions for navigator.credentials.create()
Verify and store the passkey credential created by navigator.credentials.create()

get.description: Get all passkeys for the current user

delete.description: Delete a passkey for the current user by passkey ID

get.description: Get all SSO bindings for the current user

delete.description: Delete a SSO binding for the current user by provider

put.description: Bind a SSO account (github/google) to the current user

post.description: Login via SSO (github/google) and get refresh token, access token
post.summary: SSO login(If user not exists, create a new user)

get.description: Retrieve the global script bound to the authenticated user

put.description: Create or update the global script for the authenticated user

get.description: Verify that the service is up
Retrieve all tools of the authenticated user

post.description: Create a custom tool under the authenticated user

put.description: Update an existing tool belonging to the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete a tool belonging to the authenticated user

get.description: Fetch user information based on the supplied access token

post.description: Check if a username already exists
Create a new user with username and password

delete.description: Delete the current authenticated user and all related data

put.description: Update current user's information (username, mail). Only provided fields will be updated.

parameters.description: Fields to update (only non-null fields will be updated)
parameters.name: request

password.description: password length should be between 6 and 32 characters

username.description: username length should be between 3 and 32 characters

oauth_code.description: username length should be between 3 and 32 characters

token.description: token from login API when 2FA is required
